resources.string:
Clicking on a edge darkens a line. 
Clicking on them again undarkens it. 
A double click erases the line. 

The number inside the squares indicates
 the number of lines that should be drawn
 around the four lines that surround it.
 A square with no number can have any number
 of lines around it.

 There is only one solution.

 There can only be a single loop with no loose
 ends.
